TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Usage of correct EndpointReference after providing different EndpointAddress for ConsumerReference upon subscription.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Consumer subscribes to a Producer's topic with a defined EndpointReference for the NotificationConsumer. When subscribing the System also provides a different EntpointAddress for the ConsumerReference.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created th 'Ground Picture > Forces'topic. The Consumer has subscribed to this topic
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the NotificationProducer uses the EnpointReference that was supplied upon subscription.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Consumer subscribes to a Producer's topic with a defined EndpointReference for the NotificationConsumer. When subscribing the System also provides a different EntpointAddress for the ConsumerReference.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The Producer uses the EnpointReference that was supplied upon subscription.
